translated: Amalia Rodrigues da Piedade Rebordão, commonly named Amalia Rodrigues, born July 23, 1920 and died October 6, 1999 in Lisbon (Portugal), was a great fado singer.
original: Amália da Piedade Rebordão Rodrigues, couramment nommée Amalia Rodrigues, née le 23 juillet 1920 et morte le 6 octobre 1999 à Lisbonne (Portugal), était une grande chanteuse de fado.
